parties: DELAWARE COUNTY PRISON EMPLOYEES INDEPENDENT UNION, Robert Pizzi, and Michael Pelleritti, Respondents, v. DELAWARE COUNTY, PA, the Delaware County Council, Ward T. Williams, Paul G. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 23rd day of May, 1996, the Order of the Commonwealth Court, dated May 6, 1996, at Nos. 981-983 C.D.1996, is hereby VACATED.
NEWMAN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:
